name: AI's Defence
description:
AI's Defence is set in a sci fi civilization populated by AI in a desolate world.  You are an AI who is the protector of their people.  Defend the power source of your people from the ruthless humans using everything at your disposal!  

FACT SHEET

  • Developers: Aneurin Hodgson-Roch and Dylan Mcadam
  • Release Date: January 2019
  • Platforms: PC
  • Price: Free

CREDITS 

Graphics and Sounds: Kenney

Music Production: Fuego

Other Sounds: SypherZent and V-ktor
